Act Title: THE LUSHAI HILLS DISTRICT (CHANGE OF NAME) ACT, 1954

Act Definition.0: An Act to change the name of the Lushai Hills District.

paragraphs.0: (1) This Act may be called the Lushai Hills District (Change of Name) Act, 1954.
paragraphs.1: (2) It shall come into force on such date1 as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.

Section 2..heading: Lushai Hills District to be known as Mizo District.

paragraphs.0: The tribal area in Assam now known as the Lushai Hills District shall, as from the commencement of this Act, be known as the Mizo District.

Section 3..heading: Amendment of the Sixth Schedule to the Constitution.

0.text: In the Sixth Schedule to the Constitution , in paragraph 20,—
(a) after sub-paragraph (2), the following sub-paragraph shall be inserted namely:—

contains.0: “(2A) The Mizo District shall comprise the area which at the commencement of this Constitution was known as the Lushai Hills District.”;

contains.1: (b) in sub-paragraph (3), after the words “United Khasi Jaintia Hills District” the words “and the Mizo District” shall be inserted; and
contains.2: (c) in Part A of the table, for the words “The Lushai Hills District”, the words “The Mizo District” shall be substituted.

Section 4..heading: Reference to Lushai Hills District to be construed as reference to Mizo District.

paragraphs.0: Any reference to the Lushai Hills District in any law, instrument or other document shall, unless the context otherwise requires, be construed as a reference to the Mizo District.

Page 2.0: 1.  1st  September,  1954,  vide  notification  No.  S.R.O.  2832  (E),  dated  1stSeptember,  1954,  see  Gazette  of  India,Extraordinary, Part II, sec. 3(i).
